column1: fuller around off, a bit of shape away, Bancroft pushes it through covers, off the mark with a couple
fuller and some shape away once again, taps it towards cover for a quick single, a direct hit at the non-striker's end would have been close

dropped! The debutant keeper, Gilkes, has dropped a regulation catch, was fuller around off, Marsh pushed at it, got an outside edge, Gilkes went reverse cup but failed to latch. He had a couple of chances to pouch but couldn't
length on middle and leg, dabbed towards square leg
fuller outside off, and creamed through covers, all the way for four this time
short of length around off, defended towards point from the back foot
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards fine leg
short of length outside off, Bancroft goes for the punch but misses
length outside off, pushes it towards cover off the back foot
back of length, some room outside off, cuts it hard but straight to backward point
short of length, just outside off, stays back and chops it towards covers
short and wide and cuts it hard, the backward point throws himself to his right, gets a hand, deflecting it towards cover
and he strikes first ball. It's full and straight, Bancroft misses out on the flick and is struck in front of the leg stump
fuller around off, punched towards long-off for a single
short of length, goes for a short-arm pull but misses and his struck high on the thigh
short and pulled away from outside off, didn't middle it but gets three to deep midwicket
length around off, stays in the crease and blocks
back of length, nipping back in, Mitchell was looking to pull flick it away, misses and is hit on the thigh
length on middle and leg, tucked away behind square on the leg side
length ball but straying down the leg side, clipped away to fine leg
fuller on the stumps, Mitchell looks to go aerial, doesn't middle it but manages to hit it wide of mid-on fielder for two more
back of length on the stumps, drops it on the leg side for a quick single
length but way down the leg side
slower one on the pads and picks it towards deep square leg
length, just around off, drops it at his feet for a run
starts with a leg side half-volley and Mitchell just flicks it towards fine leg, the fielder is a bit squarer and that's four more
length around off, dabs it towards point
length, on middle and leg, Mitchell Marsh was playing back, pushes it towards the bowler in the end
short of length, a transfer of weight by Mitchell Marsh and pulled disdainfully towards deep square leg
length around off, chops it towards point and steals a quick single
fuller around off, looks to work it towards midwicket, gets an inside edge past the stumps
short of length around off, steers it towards short third man
short of length outside off and Mitchell Marsh cracks a pull through midwicket for four
slower length ball on the pads, pushed towards midwicket for one more
another slower one, length ball around off this time, opens the face to guide it towards short third man
short again, pulled towards deep backward square leg this time, protection there
another slower ball, but in the radar, Shaun Marsh hits it down the ground, past the mid-off fielder on his left
starts with a slider on middle and leg, worked towards deep square leg, a direct hit at the striker's end but that only concedes an extra run
short of length, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
tossed up around middle, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
flatter on the stumps, flicks it towards deep backward square leg
a googly this time but short of length, pulls it towards deep midwicket
another googly, short around off, pushed down the wicket off the back foot, Fawad moves to his right to field himself
starts with a flatter and quicker one, chopped towards point off the back foot
fuller this time and way down the leg side
fuller and wider outside off, smashes it towards sweeper cover
length around off, punched off the back foot towards sweeper cover once more
fuller on the stumps, makes some room and drives it towards long-on
in the blockhole, fired in. Marsh loses his balance as he digs it out towards short fine leg
use of feet to take it on the full, pushed towards long-on
a wrong'un and pulled away, in the air and straight to Daniel Sams at deep midwicket, and he puts it down
length on middle and leg, pushed towards short midwicket for one
use of feet but gets too close to the ball, digs it out back towards the bowler
googly and driven towards the left of the mid-on fielder for a couple
googly again, Marsh wasn't to the pitch of the ball but goes with the shot and clears long-on with ease, first six of the night
finally someone takes a catch. Sandhu it is. Mitchell Marsh skips down but Green bowls it wide, forcing a top-edge towards short fine leg, Sandhu had all the time to settle under
short and wide and cuts it hard, a full-length dive by the sweeper cover saves one run
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-off
length ball on the pads, placed fine, past Shane Watson at short fine leg for four
length around off, pushed towards short midwicket for one
fuller and Turner goes straight again, one bounce to the left of Chris Jordan at long-on
length outside off, goes down and sweeps it towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards the left of deep midwicket
short of length outside off, dabs it towards short third man and sets off for a quick run
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards midwicket
a googly, Turner fails to pick it, goes for the cut and gets beaten on the inside edge
slider on middle and leg, misses the flick and gets rapped on the pad
flatter and quicker outside off, cuts it towards deep backward point
fuller around off, driven but extra cover cuts it off
fuller, almost a yorker on leg stump, digs it towards deep square leg and jumps back to complete the second
length on middle and leg, flicks it towards midwicket for another easy single
length outside off, Turner goes for the big shot, taking it from outside off but ends up dragging it straight to Chris Jordan at long-on
fuller around off, hits it back towards the bowler
fuller on middle and leg, pushes it towards midwicket
short of length, goes for the pull but it hurries on to the batsman, one to long-on
short of length, skips down the track but ends up pushing it back towards the bowler
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards backward square leg
short of length outside off, Marsh goes for the cut but fails to keep it down, luckily for him it just beats the diving Watson at point on his right
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off
fuller on the stumps, Cartwright goes for the reverse sweep, takes it on the full and hits it past short third man
flatter and wider outside off, Cartwright cannot fetch it and misses, the keeper breaks the stumps but Cartwright had dragged his foot in by then
fuller on the stumps, use of feet to drive it towards wide long-on. Hundred is up with that brace
fuller around off, steered towards backward point
fuller around off, skips down and hits it straight, a flat six over the bowler's head
short of length and cuts it away, deep cover had no chance as the ball races towards the backward point fence
and that's fifty for Marsh, off 35 balls. Length around middle and leg, use of feet to push it towards long-on
bowled fuller outside off, wide of the crease, driven towards wide long-off
Marsh was looking to skip down but Fawad shortens his length, chopped towards point for one
fuller outside off, reaches out but fails to middle it, mistimed towards covers
flatter outside off, dabs it towards short third man
shortens the length once again as he sees Marsh coming down, worked towards long-on
fuller and wider outside off, sliced over backward point for four
slower length ball on middle, pulls it awkwardly towards square leg
fuller around off, Cartwright was stuck on the back foot, played all around it and got struck right in front of middle, near knee-roll
fuller around off, steered towards backward point
length on middle and leg, dabs it on the leg side and gets off the mark
slower bouncer this time, Marsh was early in to the pull, fails to connect
length on middle, clears his front leg and goes for the pull, mistimes it towards midwicket but will get a couple
fuller outside off, looks to smash it through the off side, gets beaten
short of length, moves towards the off side and pulls it towards midwicket
short of length, another slower one, couldn't time the pull to perfection because of the lack of pace, one to deep midwicket
short of length, Jordan once again takes the pace off, Hobson looks to pull it hard, misses
another slower length ball across the batsman, Hobson misses the pull but Gilkes behind the stumps lets it go through his legs for four byes
short of length, way outside off, Marsh reaches out but ends up hitting right back towards the bowler
short and wide and this time Marsh goes over extra cover, one bounce and over the boundary line
fuller on the stumps this time and this has been launched over deep midwicket, into the crowd
what a shot that was! Short and wide and slapped over extra cover, just clears the boundary, 75 metres
a full toss on the stumps, hits it towards long-on, Hobson is quick to come back for the second
fuller and smashed right back, Daniel Sams couldn't get his foot out in time and it hit him flush on the right shin. He's in some pain there, and the physio is there to tend him
short of length on the stumps, pulls it behind square leg
short of length, goes for the pull but too close to him, no connection
another short one, pulls it towards deep backward square leg for one
short of length on middle and leg, moves across and looks to pull it fine, misses
gets lucky this time. Short of length outside off, throws his bat at it, gets an outside edge that flies between the keeper and the short third man

would you believe it, it's another drop! Slower one on the pads, picked away towards deep backward square leg by Hobson, the fielder pedals back but it goes through his hands for a six. Rainbird the fielder
short of length, wait for the slower ball and smashes it over long-on for a biggie
a full toss outside off and he smashes it towards deep extra cover, the sweeper cover cannot cut it off
short of length and he has absolutely smashed it over deep midwicket, another six and he has moved to 95, three balls left in the innings
fuller, down the leg side, goes for the flick but misses but they collect two leg-byes
fuller on the pads again, Marsh looks to go big but misses, to the keeper off the pads
a wide full toss outside off, mistimes it towards extra cover for one and finishes on 96
fuller around off, almost squaring Watson off as he looks to work it on the leg side, a thick outside edge
almost a yorker around off, Watson brings his bat down in time to take it on the full
short and pulled away fine, one-bounce four to fine leg
fuller around off, stays back and steers it towards backward point
fuller outside off and crashed through covers for four, off the mark
fuller and wider, no feet all hands, throws his bat at it and gets beaten
fuller around off, looks to drive through covers, the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards short midwicket
fuller again and Watson middles the drive this time but the cover fielder cuts it off
down the leg side, Watson looks to go big but misses, called a wide
length, just outside off, goes for the cut but misses
a partial stop at mid-off restricts it to one. Was fuller around off, Watson drives it to the left of mid-off
fuller around off, looks to drive but ends up hitting it towards third man
length around off, dabbed towards third man
length around off, defended on the off side
length around off, drops it towards covers
short and swivels across to pull it behind square for one
length on middle and leg, swats it towards midwicket, overthrow results in two extra runs
fuller and wider, looks to drive it through covers, misses
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards point
length outside off, punched towards point
Tye takes a great catch and Watson departs. Length outside off, goes for the big shot but ends up skying it towards the left of mid-off

length but on the pads and flicked away towards deep backward square leg, a tumbling effort by Cartwright near the boundary, but when he attempted to flick it inside for the second time, his foot was grounded outside
fuller around off, looks to go over mid-off, a thick outside edge towards third man
fuller on middle and leg, moves across and flicks it towards fine leg
fuller around off, driven straight to extra cover
length around off and middle, Ferguson stays back and pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller outside off and smashes it past the non-striker for four
back of length, following the batsman, Ferguson was moving away and pushes at it, gets an outside edge that flies past the keeper
length around off, pushes it towards short midwicket
just clears the mid-on, length ball, angling in, backs away and looks to go aerial, gets a couple in the end
length outside off, pushes it towards point for a quick single
fuller around off and Ferguson clears his front leg and lofts it over the bowler's head for a straight six
length ball on the pads, tucked around the corner for a quick single
a bouncer, aimed at the batsman but too high as per the umpire
back of length around off, stays behind the line and defends it towards the bowler
back of length outside off, punched into the ground towards backward point
length around off, coming in with the angle to cramp the batsman, defended
length outside off, looks to hit it through covers, misses
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
short of length outside off, Gilkes goes for the upper-cut, Behrendorff goes for the catch but it lands just short
back of length outside off, dabs it towards third man
short again and Gilkes has ramped it over the keeper's head, carries all the way for six
short again and pulled away towards deep square leg
short again and pulled away towards deep midwicket, fielder there
starts with a short of length on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket
length around off, sweeps and sweeps hard and a mis-field by Tye at deep midwicket allows a boundary, through his legs
another sweep, this time towards square leg, only a single
tossed up around off, Ferguson clears his front leg and smashes it to the left of long-off for four
goes for the sweep and ends up top-edging it towards midwicket, Cartwright makes great ground from deep midwicket, puts in the dive, gets his hands to it but can't latch on to
a googly and worked away towards midwicket for one more
length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, punched towards cover-point for a quick run
length outside off, Ferguson goes for the cut, gets an outside edge past the keeper
short outside off, moves across and pulls it towards deep midwicket
fuller around off, backs away and hits it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, backs away and hits it towards mid-off, a tumbling stop there keeps it to one
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and smashes it over long-on, into the crowd
a big googly down the leg side, Ferguson fails to pick it, ends up pushing it in the air towards midwicket
shorter and flatter, extra bounce there, Gilkes pulls it towards long-off
short again, goes back for the pull but under-edges it into the ground
full, on the stumps and another six down the ground, and that's fifty for Ferguson off just 24 balls
short of length but down the leg side
fuller around off and spinning away but Ferguson goes again, drags it over long-on for the third six of the over
short, hurries on to the batsman who was looking to pull it, the ball hits the top edge and goes over the keeper's head, all the way for a six
slower one outside off, looks to hit hard and gets beaten
another slower one, length but way outside off, goes for the cut but misses again
short and wide but this time Gilkes makes a neat connection, rocks back and hits it over backward point, one bounce and over the rope
another slower one, just outside leg and beats the drive, a big appeal for lbw but denied
fuller on the stumps, backs away and looks to hit it towards midwicket, an inside edge on to the leg
length outside off, backs away but ends up hitting it towards mid-off. A direct-hit and Ferguson would have been gone
length outside off, goes back and cuts but straight to backward point
fuller on the pads, goes for the flick but misses, gets a leg-bye though
short of length on the stumps, backs away and smashes it over extra cover for four
down the track, inside out and over deep extra cover this time, fifth six of the night for Ferguson
a slower bouncer, looks to swat it away but misses
slower one but down the leg side and given a wide
short of length around off, mistimes it back towards the bowler
short outside off, pulls it towards deep square leg
fuller outside off, looks to hit it down the ground, mistimed towards long-on
fuller and wider outside off, Gilkes reaches out but cannot put bat on the ball
fuller, just outside off, steered towards point
short of length outside off and Gilkes goes with the pull, clears the fielder at deep square leg to end the over with a six
length ball, on middle and leg, pulled behind square for one
fuller around off and middle, mistimes it towards fine leg
down the track but ends up almost yorking himself, a single on the leg side
short of length down the leg side, a mistimed swipe to short fine leg
backs away but Coulter-Nile follows him, a low full toss steered towards sweeper cover
and that's his fifty, on debut. Fuller on the stumps and punched towards long-on
fuller around off, hits it towards long-off
a low full toss outside off, steered towards deep backward point
length outside off, clears his front leg and goes aerial but ends up top-edging it to long-off where Marsh takes a neat catch
short and wide and cuts it towards sweeper cover
back of length outside off, dabbed towards short third man
length ball, in the slot and lofted over long-on for six, he moves to 80 off just 37
short of length, goes back and pushes it towards short midwicket
short and wide and cuts it straight to extra cover this time
length ball on middle and leg, spinning in to the batsman to beat the bat and rap him on the pads, was it going down? The umpire doesn't think so and Devcich departs for 1
slider, on middle and leg, Sams lets it hit the pads
a googly, doesn't pick it. Looks to heave it on the leg side, misses but will get a leg-bye to short third man
short of length, pulled towards deep midwicket, one bounce to the fielder
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards long-on for one
short and wide and cuts it towards sweeper cover for one
almost in the blockhole, just outside off, Ferguson fails to get bat on it
a full toss outside off, hits it towards deep point
a slower one outside off, throws his bat, gets an edge but doesn't carry to the keeper
what a yorker! Right in the blockhole, the stumps are rattled before Sams could bring his bat down. Still 31 needed off 18
short of length, backs away and pulls it between deep midwicket and long-on, a much-needed boundary for Thunder
a full toss this time, Ferguson hits it straight down the ground, he wants to finish it quickly
slower one outside off and he has slashed it past point, beats the man in the deep, third successive four for Ferguson, what an innings this has been, 95 not out off 44
a bouncer this time and he pulls it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for two more, brings the equation down to 17 off 14
bouncer again, Ferguson looks to pull it down but fails to get bat on it
fuller outside off and he slashes it towards deep extra cover, keeps the strike with the single
short and wide and cuts it over backward point, his seventh six to bring up his second T20 hundred, just ten needed now
short of length, stays back and works it towards mid-on, Chris Green charges back for the second
fuller on the stumps, goes back and looks to cut it away, misses
fuller on the stumps, an inside edge to fine leg
short of length outside off, punched towards backward point
short of length, backs away but ends up hitting it back towards the bowler
goes deep and lofts it over long-off, for a second it looked like he has hit it straight to long-off but it keeps sailing
length ball, on the pads, misses the flick but the leg-bye would do
